ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.5_0: If he makes one, or has one made, for someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.7.1_0: there is no offense for him.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.11_0: The first rule, the training rule on silk, is finished.
